docker_registry: {{('' if cookiecutter.pypi_schema in ['', '-'] else cookiecutter.pypi_schema+'://') + cookiecutter.pypi_host_and_path + ('' if cookiecutter.docker_port in ['', '-'] else (':'+cookiecutter.pypi_port))}}

{{('' if cookiecutter.docker_schema in ['', '-'] else cookiecutter.docker_schema+'://') + cookiecutter.docker_host + ('' if cookiecutter.docker_port in ['', '-'] else (':'+cookiecutter.docker_port))}}
docker_image: {{(cookiecutter.docker_host if cookiecutter.docker_hubname in ['', '-'] else cookiecutter.docker_hubname) + '/' + cookiecutter.docker_host}}
